name: Space Virus (Mohammad Ghasemi)
description:
Viruses are Bad but do you know what is worse? SPACE VIRUSES!

So jump into your fighter and KILL all the Viruses.

Additional Features:

1. Different types of Bullets

2. Free ability to dodge bullets

3. Regenerable armor

4. Different kinds of powerful abilities (Shield, Ultimate)

5. Unique Boss Fight

6. Three different Areas

7. New Effects

8. Brand New UI and Setting

*To test all abilities and bullet types before starting a level in setting check unlock abilities and in the pause menu, you can see key bindings*

Credits:

Created by Mohammad Ghasemi
